text: Consider the following pseudo code: nta=0; intb=1; void foo (int i, int j){ i=i+1; print (a + 1, j); } void main(){ foo (a, a + b); print a; } Which of the following statement is/are true? (a) If parameters are passed by reference, then the output of the program is: 22 1. (b) If parameters are passed by reference, then the output of the program is: 2 1 1. (c) If parameters are passed by name, then the output of the program is: 22 1. (d) If parameters are passed by name, then the output of the program is: 2 1 1.
